short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates random personal information for specified text elements on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Anonymizer for PII" is a must-have tool for anyone who needs to protect personal information in their web page presentations.

TLDR: take screenshots of anonymized personal data.

It's perfect for developers, QA testers, and marketers who need to present realistic-looking data while maintaining confidentiality and adhering to data protection regulations.

Key features:

• Customizable selectors for different data types (names, emails, addresses, etc.).
• Random generation of plausible, non-repetitive data.
• Immediate application of changes without needing to reload the page.
• User-friendly interface for easy configuration.
